籤詩版本二:
Osamvera nkhani zopanda pake za chabwino ndi choipa, m'mawa ndi madzulo mukhoza kunena kuti Ami
Ngati mawu akutchire ali oona, bukhu lakuti "How to Stop Hungry" liri ndi mawu oti "general", ndipo ili ndi liwu lakuti "mphoto".
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chizindikiro cha makeke kuti athetse njala.
Chilichonse chimakhala chopanda kanthu komanso chocheperako.
解曰: Ngati maganizo ali osadziwa, n’kopanda ntchito kuwerenga malemba. Mofanana ndi keke yopakidwa utoto, chakudyacho n’chovuta kumeza.
籤詩故事一:
◇Cao Cao amalankhula za plums zomwe zimathetsa ludzu lake
Panthawi ya Maufumu Atatu, Cao Cao anatsogolera asilikali ake.Kunali kusowa kwa madzi m'nyengo yamvula ndipo asilikali anali ndi ludzu.Cao Cao ananama kuti kutsogolo kunali nkhalango ya plums, ndipo amatha kudya plums kumeneko kuti athetse ludzu lake.
(Mwambi woti “kuyang’ana maluwa a plums kuti uthetse ludzu” ukuchokera apa. Umagwirizana ndi mawu akuti “kupaka makeke kuti athetse njala”.)
聖意: Pemphererani zabwino zonse m'nyumba mwanu (zosavomerezeka), zabwino zonse pachuma (musaganize), kusinthana bwino (dikirani pang'ono), zopinga m'banja (mimba yopanda kanthu), oyenda pansi, nyongolotsi zochedwa, ndi bwino kubzala. Ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi zisanayambike, zosayenera kupeza anthu (zovuta), milandu ya anthu komanso (osakhala osangalala) Kusamuka ndikosunga, kutayika katundu, matenda, ndikufunira zabwino mapiri ndi manda.
古人: Cao Cao amalankhula za plums kuthetsa ludzu lake
